function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insulation harboring insulation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupants not feeling comfortable or feeling ill in the building","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to cleaners","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of regular cleaning and maintenance of hvac systems can lead to the buildup of dirt, mold, and other contaminants, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases through the air.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate handling of dirty filters during replacement can lead to the spread of
